free: #e That old man picked guavas earnestly.
#c 那老人認真地摘番石榴。
#e He climbed up a ladder and picked guavas.
#n mikayabes指摘番石榴，根據發音者表示，si是「有；擁有」的意思，si-bili有肚子表示懷孕。
#e Two baskets were full of guavas he picked.
#c 他摘的番石榴已經裝滿兩簍了。
#n tumes「滿」亦可寫成tusa ku ma-tumes-ay tu a biluwa。
#e At that time, a man pulled a goat and passed by there.
#c 那時候有一個男人牽著一隻羊經過那裡。
#e Soon, there was a boy riding a bicycle and passing by there.
#c 不久有個男孩騎腳踏車經過那裡。
#n maka-batikal mi-caliw-ay i tiza 亦可說成maka-batikal a mi-caliw-ay i tiza
#n maka 加上交通工具有搭乘該種交通工具之意
#e He stopped and wanted to steal those guavas.
#c 他停下來想偷那些番石榴。
#e He put it in front of the bicycle and walked away.
#c 他就放在腳踏車前面，他就要走了。
#n i aayaw 表示空間的前面，i ayaw 表示時間的前面。
#e He rode a bicycle fast on a road.
#c 他就在路上騎腳踏車，騎得很快。

gloss: 主焦-KA-腳踏車-表事實=完成貌
free: #e He met a girl who also rode a bicycle.
#c 他遇到也是騎腳踏車的女孩。
#e That boy stared at that girl.
#e He did not see the front road.
#e He bumped into a very big stone.
#e He fell down and all of the guavas scattered on the ground.
#c 他跌倒，番石榴全部散落在地上。
#e At that time, there were three boys walking over there.
#c 那時候有三個男孩在那裡走。
#e Those three boys hurried to help that kid to pick up guavas.
#c 那三個男孩趕快過去幫那小孩撿番石榴。
#e And he rode a bicycle home.
#e At that time, the three boys who were walking saw the hat that boy forgot to take.
#c 那時候正在走路的三個男孩看到那男孩忘記的帽子。
#e That child who was walking whistled.
#c 那在走路的小孩吹口哨。
#e That boy who rode a bicycle stopped.
#c 那騎腳踏車的小孩停下來。
#n dala 是阿美語，義同sakizaya 的 tayza 「去」。
#e The child who rode a bicycle thanked him.
#c 那騎腳踏車的小孩謝謝他。
#e He said everyone had one pomegranate.
#c 他說你們三個人一人一個。
#e The child who rode a bicycle thanked him and walked away.
#c 騎車的小孩心裡很感謝，他就走了。
#e The three children who were walking had eaten guavas and walked away.
#c 那三個走路的小孩吃了番石榴，然後走了。
#n mukan tu muculil tu 邊吃邊走。

gloss: 表未來=主焦-經過-名物化

free: #e Three people who were walking passed the place where the old man was.
#c 走路的那三個人要經過那老人那裡。
#e The old man climbed down a tree.
#n sa在這不可刪，故不標做DM。根據發音者，azih ciniza不合語法，若要刪除SA 則需說mi-azih ciniza。
#e I had three baskets, didn’t I?
#n tulu ku biluwa aku 我有三簍。
#n na tulu ku biluwa aku 我曾有三簍，可是現在沒有。
#n na…kyami 為常用句型表示不是…吧？
#n na mabecol tu ciniza kyami 他不是吃飽了嗎?
#e There were two baskets which were full.
#e One basket disappeared and there were two baskets now.
#c 一簍不見了，現在剩下二簍。
#e He thought that only one basket was full.
#e At that time, the three children who were walking passed there.
#c 那時候那走路的三個小孩經過那裡。
#e That old man saw the leftover of the guava in their hands.
#c 那老人看到他們手上還有吃剩的番石榴。
#n nuni-taes-an niza kya wawa 那小孩被他打。
#n IU 87 的 nu 可代換成nya。
#e (He thought) it is those children who stole my guavas.
#c (他想) 就是那孩子們偷了我的番石榴。
#n henaca 為 henay aca 的縮寫。
#n ca’ay kazateng niza ciniza (他沒想到) 思考。
#n ca’ay kapizateng ciniza i cinizaan (他從來不想) 思考。
#n ca’ay pizateng ciniza i cinizaan (他不想) 思考。
